mapper.insert: insert into bacs_Category (categoryNum, categoryName, storeId) values (BACS_CATEGORY_SEQ.nextval ,#{categoryName} ,#{storeId})
mapper.delete: delete from bacs_Category where categoryNum = #{categoryNum} and storeId = #{storeId}
mapper.update: update BACS_CATEGORY set CATEGORYNAME = #{categoryName} where CATEGORYNUM = #{categoryNum} and storeId = #{storeId}
mapper.select: select * from BACS_MENU where categoryNum = #{categoryNum} and storeId = #{storeId}
